name: HSN
0:
”Alexa, open HSN.”
”Alexa, ask HSN what's the Today's Special.”
”Alexa, ask HSN to play the live stream.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: h. s. n.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Do you want to know what the Today’s Special is, or listen to HSN’s live broadcast? With HSN’s Alexa skill, you can easily find your favorite shows, products and personalities. Through a mix of entertainment and expertise, HSN provides an entirely unique curated shopping experience bringing our customers the thrill of discovery every day!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
